'''哈萊姆-148街車站'''（{{lang-en|Harlem–148th Street}}），指示牌顯示為「148街-萊諾克斯總站」（{{lang|en|148th Street–Lenox Terminal}}）是[[紐約地鐵|紐約地鐵]][[IRT萊諾克斯大道線|IRT萊諾克斯大道線]]一個總站，位於[[哈萊姆區|哈萊姆區]]，但站名實際上有誤，車站位於149街及[[第七大道_(曼哈頓)|小亞當·克萊頓·鮑威爾林蔭路]]交界<ref name=MTA-NorthHarlemMap-2015 />。設有[[紐約地鐵3號線|3號線]]（任何時候停站）列車服務。
== 車站結構 ==

車站的位置和軌道起初為1904年啟用的[[紐約地鐵車廠#萊諾克斯車廠|萊諾克斯大道車廠]]，亦為現時3號線列車停泊的地方<ref name=NYTImes-IRTFirstCars-Lenox-1903>{{cite web|title=Task of Placing the Cars in New Subway: Transfer from the Elevated to the Underground Tracks|url=http://query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9E05E1DF123AE63AA15756C1A9679D946297D6CF|website=[[紐約時報|nytimes.com]]|publisher=[[紐約時報|紐約時報]]|accessdate=10 July 2015|date=November 15, 1903}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|title=New Contracts Let for Interboro Yards: Rejection of Earlier Bids by the City Make $50,610 Temporary Facilities Necessary|url=http://query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9C00E1D71439EF3ABC4053DFB0668389639EDE|website=[[紐約時報|nytimes.com]]|publisher=[[紐約時報|紐約時報]]|accessdate=10 July 2015|date=June 8, 1922}}</ref>。1910年代{{link-en|雙重合約|Dual Contracts}}開始曾有將萊諾克斯大道線延長至149街或150街的計劃。1916年正式提出一個延長至149街的計劃，作為萊諾克斯大道線和[[IRT傑羅姆大道線|IRT傑羅姆大道線]]在布朗克斯的連接<ref>{{cite web|title=Two Subway Agreements: Provide for Connecting Links and Station Improvements|url=http://query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D05E1DF123AE633A25751C1A9679D946796D6CF|website=[[The_New_York_Times|nytimes.com]]|publisher=[[The_New_York_Times|The New York Times]]|accessdate=10 July 2015|date=November 12, 1916}}</ref>。

1957年又計劃一個位於萊諾克斯車廠內的150街車站，以更好服務當地（包括鄰近{{link-en|哈萊姆河之家|Harlem River Houses}}）<ref name=NYAmsterdam-IRTLenoxExt-1957>{{cite web|title=Asks Extension Of IRT Subway |url=http://media.proquest.com/media/pq/hnp/doc/1093153432/fmt/ai/rep/NONE?hl=subways%2Csubway%2Csubways%2Csubway%2Clenox+avenue&cit%3Aauth=&cit%3Atitle=Asks+Extension+Of+IRT+Subway&cit%3Apub=New+York+Amsterdam+News+%281943-1961%29&cit%3Avol=&cit%3Aiss=&cit%3Apg=2&cit%3Adate=Aug+10%2C+1957&ic=true&cit%3Aprod=ProQuest+Historical+Newspapers%3A+New+York+Amsterdam+News&_%3D%3D&_s=mtj1PIAeYIwky5c5A%2BvfMn7uHts%3D#statusbar=1&zoom=150 |publisher=[[New_York_Amsterdam_News|New York Amsterdam News]] |accessdate=10 July 2015 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150710102130/http://media.proquest.com/media/pq/hnp/doc/1093153432/fmt/ai/rep/NONE?hl=subways%2Csubway%2Csubways%2Csubway%2Clenox+avenue&cit%3Aauth=&cit%3Atitle=Asks+Extension+Of+IRT+Subway&cit%3Apub=New+York+Amsterdam+News+%281943-1961%29&cit%3Avol=&cit%3Aiss=&cit%3Apg=2&cit%3Adate=Aug+10%2C+1957&ic=true&cit%3Aprod=ProQuest+Historical+Newspapers%3A+New+York+Amsterdam+News&_%3D%3D&_s=mtj1PIAeYIwky5c5A+vfMn7uHts%3D |archivedate=2015-07-10 |date=August 10, 1957 |deadurl=no }}</ref>。此車站連同布朗克斯延長線，自1940年代起就被當地居民要求興建，因為巴士服務和{{link-en|萊諾克斯大道線 (地面)|Lenox Avenue Line (surface)|地面街車}}服務不可靠<ref>{{cite web|title=Public Service Gripes Are Old|url=http://media.proquest.com/media/pq/hnp/doc/1093051542/fmt/ai/rep/NONE?hl=subways%2Csubway%2Csubways%2Csubway%2Charlem%2Charlem%2C150th+street&cit%3Aauth=&cit%3Atitle=Public+Service+Gripes+Are+Old&cit%3Apub=New+York+Amsterdam+News+%281943-1961%29&cit%3Avol=&cit%3Aiss=&cit%3Apg=7&cit%3Adate=Oct+19%2C+1946&ic=true&cit%3Aprod=ProQuest+Historical+Newspapers%3A+New+York+Amsterdam+News&_%3D%3D&_s=gN067e069hmgwaGOayQOf%2F5hC98%3D#statusbar=1&zoom=150|publisher=[[New_York_Amsterdam_News|New York Amsterdam News]]|accessdate=10 July 2015|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150710102722/http://media.proquest.com/media/pq/hnp/doc/1093051542/fmt/ai/rep/NONE?hl=subways%2Csubway%2Csubways%2Csubway%2Charlem%2Charlem%2C150th+street&cit%3Aauth=&cit%3Atitle=Public+Service+Gripes+Are+Old&cit%3Apub=New+York+Amsterdam+News+%281943-1961%29&cit%3Avol=&cit%3Aiss=&cit%3Apg=7&cit%3Adate=Oct+19%2C+1946&ic=true&cit%3Aprod=ProQuest+Historical+Newspapers%3A+New+York+Amsterdam+News&_%3D%3D&_s=gN067e069hmgwaGOayQOf%2F5hC98%3D#statusbar=1&zoom=150|archivedate=2015-07-10|date=October 19, 1946|deadurl=no}}</ref>。受萊諾克斯車廠於1960年代縮小影響，車站後來移動到149街，土地賣給發展商以在車廠和車站上蓋興建高校和住宅大樓（參見下面）<ref name=ERA-148Lenox-2007/><ref>{{cite web|title=IRT REPAIR YARD TO REVERT TO CITY: 19 Acres in Harlem Will Be Turned Back by Dec. 31 -- Realty Men Interested|url=http://query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9501E4DD1731EF3ABC4C52DFB667838B679EDE|website=[[The_New_York_Times|nytimes.com]]|publisher=[[The_New_York_Times|The New York Times]]|accessdate=10 July 2015|date=October 14, 1960}}</ref> 。

新總站在完工時曾打算取代舊總站[[145街車站_(IRT萊諾克斯大道線)|145街車站]]以免轉轍器過近妨礙月台延長至10節的工程。然而，關閉145街車站的計劃受到當地居民的抗議而取消<ref name=NYAmsterdam-145thLenox-1967>{{cite web|last1=Edwards|first1=Dick|title=145th-Lenox Subway Stop To Continue|url=http://media.proquest.com/media/pq/hnp/doc/1043451842/fmt/ai/rep/NONE?hl=subways%2Csubway%2Csubways%2Csubway%2C145th+street%2Clenox+avenue&cit%3Aauth=Edwards%2C+Dick&cit%3Atitle=145th-Lenox+Subway+Stop+To+Continue&cit%3Apub=New+York+Amsterdam+News+%281962-1993%29&cit%3Avol=&cit%3Aiss=&cit%3Apg=3&cit%3Adate=Dec+2%2C+1967&ic=true&cit%3Aprod=ProQuest+Historical+Newspapers%3A+New+York+Amsterdam+News&_%3D%3D&_s=ANffqswLiVm2%2FUlPdIVNQ6yx%2Fz0%3D#statusbar=1&zoom=150|publisher=[[New_York_Amsterdam_News|New York Amsterdam News]]|accessdate=10 July 2015|date=December 2, 1967|deadurl=yes|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150710092400/http://media.proquest.com/media/pq/hnp/doc/1043451842/fmt/ai/rep/NONE?hl=subways%2Csubway%2Csubways%2Csubway%2C145th+street%2Clenox+avenue&cit%3Aauth=Edwards%2C+Dick&cit%3Atitle=145th-Lenox+Subway+Stop+To+Continue&cit%3Apub=New+York+Amsterdam+News+%281962-1993%29&cit%3Avol=&cit%3Aiss=&cit%3Apg=3&cit%3Adate=Dec+2%2C+1967&ic=true&cit%3Aprod=ProQuest+Historical+Newspapers%3A+New+York+Amsterdam+News&_%3D%3D&_s=ANffqswLiVm2%2FUlPdIVNQ6yx%2Fz0%3D#statusbar=1&zoom=150|archivedate=2015年7月10日|df=}}{{cbignore|bot=medic}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.subwaynut.com/irt/148n3/index.php|title=148th Street–Lenox Terminal Pictures|first=Jeremiah|last=Cox|publisher=The Subway Nut|date=June 26, 2008|accessdate=September 1, 2012}}</ref>。148街車站於1968年5月13日啟用<ref name=NYTImes-148LenoxOpen-1968 />。當時站名為「149街-第七大道車站」（{{lang|en|149th Street–Seventh Avenue}}），但由於可能與[[149街-大廣場車站|149街-大廣場車站]]混淆，改名為「148街-萊諾克斯總站車站」（{{lang|en|148th Street–Lenox Terminal}}）<ref name=ERA-148Lenox-2007>{{Cite journal|url=https://issuu.com/erausa/docs/2007-01-bulletin-unabridged/5|title=148th Street-Lenox Terminal and How it Got its Name|last=Raudenbush|first=Henry|journal=New York Division Bulletin|publisher=Electric Railroaders Association|access-date=2016-06-20|date=January 2007|volume=50|issue=1}}</ref>。

1990年代站名牌為倒轉的「萊諾克斯總站-148街車站」（{{lang|en|Lenox Terminal–148th Street}}），直至2003年改回原名為止<ref>{{cite web|last1=Weinberg|first1=Brian|title=Station sign, by 2003|url=http://www.nycsubway.org/perl/show?25724|website=www.nycsubway.org|publisher=www.nycsubway.org|accessdate=23 August 2016|date=24 June 2003}}</ref>。

由1995年起至2008年，此站沒有全日服務，3號線列車於深夜時並不營運。全日服務於2008年7月27日開始<ref>{{cite press release |title=Service Enhancements on 3 Line |publisher=MTA New York City Transit |date=2008-07-24 |url=http://www.mta.info/mta/news/releases/?en=080724-NYCT109 |accessdate=2008-07-26}}</ref>。

此站是IRT萊諾克斯大道線的北端總站，設有一個[[島式月台|島式月台]]和兩條軌道。軌道於月台西端的[[止衝擋|止衝擋]]結束。車站旁邊是[[紐約地鐵車廠#萊諾克斯車廠|萊諾克斯車廠]]，用作列車儲存但不設維修設施。車廠於車站啟用前已存在，於1968年加入。由於車廠和軌道連接為現成的，因此建設費用相對較低<ref name=NYTImes-148LenoxOpen-1968>{{cite news| title=IRT Passengers Get New 148th St. Station| newspaper=[[The_New_York_Times|The New York Times]]| date=May 14, 1968| page=95|url=http://select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20710F639541B7B93C6A8178ED85F4C8685F9| accessdate=October 4, 2011}}</ref><ref name=NYAmsterdam-IRTLenoxExt-1957/>。過去總站為一站以南的[[145街車站_(IRT萊諾克斯大道線)|145街車站]]。由於天花板較高，月台服務指示牌經重電纜懸掛。

車站似乎是地下車站，但實際上此站與旁邊的車廠均位於地面。然而與其他地面車站不同，148街車站不可無障礙通行，因為前往月台的道路設有樓梯。
